metadata.title: Friday, 24th November, 2023
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) what procedure was used in the procurement of erythromycin drugs from Mission Pharma, a pharmaceutical company; and
(b) what measures are being taken to prevent the procurement of substandard medical drugs and medical kits in future.

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security
parts: (a) whether the Government is aware that a suspect was found dead in police cells on Sunday, 19th November, 2023, in Mkushi North Parliamentary Constituency after allegedly being tortured by police officers;
(b) if so, what urgent measures are being taken to safeguard the lives of suspects in detention; and
(c) what measures are being taken to prevent such occurrences at police stations, countrywide.
